trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_00<tab>Momodi of the Quicksand has word of work for a willing adventurer.

TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_01<tab>Momodi informs you that Dadanen, a merchant who deals in precious stones, is seeking the aid of an able adventurer. Travel to the settlement of Horizon in western Thanalan and see what work he offers.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_02<tab>Dadanen tells you that Horizon's role as a center for trade means there is always work to be found. Look around the settlement and see what it has to offer.

TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_1<tab>Look what the coeurl dragged in. Good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'd ask what brings you, but I reckon we both know the answer to that already.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_2<tab>Well, have I ever let you down before? Wait, don't answer that...

TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_3<tab>So happens I know a fella by the name of Dadanen who needs a hand. He's a merchant by trade, sellin' precious stones to those in Ul'dah with the means to buy them.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_4<tab>He's asked that I send any lookin' for work his way. You can find him over in Horizon, if you fancy.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_5<tab>That's in western Thanalan, mind you. Just cross the bridge north of Scorpion Crossing and the road will take you there.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_100_5<tab>Knowin' the circles he deals in, might be he'll have some talk of the royal family that'll interest you, as well.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_6<tab>And why not make use of a chocobo porter for the journey to Horizon? If you've the gil for it, that is.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_7<tab>You'll find the chocobo stables just across the way from my Quicksand. Find Mimigun─he'll set you straight.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_8<tab>Well, off you go, then. I haven't got all day to be holdin' your bloody hand!
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_10<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I presume? Aye, Momodi said to expect you, and so I have.

TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_11<tab>Welcome to Horizon. Ours is a trading settlement that sees goods in from the port of Vesper Bay to the west─and trade we do. Nary a day goes by that Horizon isn't bustling with some manner of merchants and officials.

TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_12<tab>They keep us running about busy, they do. Enough so that I wish I had chocobo legs in place of my own. And that's why I've asked Momodi to send me any souls looking for work.
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_13<tab>Twelve know there is plenty of it to be done around here. Speak to me again when you are ready to make yourself of some use.
